mapper.select:
select
from tnc_car,tnc_car_type,tnc_store,tnc_brand
type_id =tnc_car_type.id and store_id = tnc_store.id and brand_id = tnc_brand.id AND ( tnc_car.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR series LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR quantity LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR tnc_car_type.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR tnc_store.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR tnc_brand.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
